content: I have two very simple PRs: #83343, #83348, both change rustc_parse_format. Would anyone want to review these?
I want to help, what should i do?

Thanks @Jack Huey ! @M4tr1xt4ng these PRs just need approvals, they're very simple and don't need detailed reviews, so I just needed someone with the approval rights (e.g. a maintainer) to approve the PRs.
